channel.title: IRC probelms
channel.description:
Just womndering, since I can't find the other posts, what are your vewis on the irc? should we move? should we have very oppressive ops? what are your thoughts?
also, -warn please

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

frank_:

stab the haters, the internets are for fun

Oh Frank ASL PLS <—

But yeah, some of the ops need to talk to each other on who they banned, say, i got banned for 1 day it ended up 3 because of the ops not talking to each other because i was saying to the other ops that i was supposed to be unbanned by now but didnt know if it was true that i was supposed to be unbanned after a day

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I, just like everyone including the ops was talking to quux about the problems. Then c|p muted the channel and wouldn’t let us explain ourselves. THis was the first time I have gone on the IRc in a while so it wasn’t my fault
ps: warns last a week and my week is up and all the mods siad they were busy lol

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Just womndering, since I can't find the other posts, what are your vewis on the irc? should we move? should we have very oppressive ops? what are your thoughts?

also, -warn please

The ops are opressive, the only reason you feel that way is because you wouldn’t shutup and the the FreeNode staff talk and then ended up getting the whole channel muted, (well not just you, but you were a part of it).

(by the way, you can’t ask for your warning removed like that, gg)

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

no it is not, I am not purpofully getting us kciked off, plus then we won’t have freenode staff issues. It is there rules, I am just quesitoning. why follow only the rules that suit us? ( no swearing or racism or Dcc explointing or spamming?)

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I don’t see why you’re trying to get us kicked off on purpose Bobby.

If you get #moparscape closed on purpose, the next best channel for them to go is obviously #mopar.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:80298”][quote author=juju link=topic=117884.msg1159479#msg1159479 date=1176629535]
Unlawful activities and their related support activities are considered off-topic, as are inappropriate advertising, heavy media file trading, gaming and proprietary game software modding, warez, hax0r activity, porn and various forms of antisocial behavior, including (but not limited to) political, racial, ethnic, religious or gender-related invective. Off-topic activity may result in users being barred from the network.
[/quote]
i agree[/quote]

[14:25:15] So no. Software modding isn’t against our rules

He doesn’t.

Read full topic

item.title: IRC probelms
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

frank_:

stab the haters, the internets are for fun

I don’t see how you can complain. I’ve seen you post in topics in the past complaining about people from Moparscape posting their questions here, and so on. Others complain that they don’t read the rules. That makes many people hypocrites, because you guys are refusing to read and follow Freenode’s rules, but expect new users that come here to read ours.

Freenode has loads of resources. The people in channels there are often a hell of a lot better then people at this community. If you think you’re ‘the shit’ because you can hack a Java game, and therefore don’t need to abide by other rules when we use resources that are not our own, then you’re a joke.

Read full topic
